html:
updateCache

The flag that specifies whether the insert() operation must retrieve data from the server and write it to the cache. By default, true.

Available values

true

Mobile Creatio caches added data. Mobile Creatio omits the updateCache: true parameter value when the EnableMobileDataAutoSynchronization additional feature is enabled.

false

Mobile Creatio works with data directly from the cache, omitting the data source.
